title: The Autobiography of an Ex-Colored Man - crush

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Johnson uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex response to having a crush.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Johnson uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex response to having a crush.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
